ml:doc-envelope.ml:original-txt: ï»¿Q6qTOAL STA [UTORY COMMITTEE REPORT TO: The President, Internati nal Bank for Reconstruction and Development Recommendation of the -xpert selected by the Dominican Republic as a member of the Committee under Sectic n 4 (iii) of Article III of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Loan (Integratod Social Protection and Promotion Project) to the Dominican Republic The undersigned membe- of the Committee constituted under Section 7 of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of Int rnational Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) hereby submits this recommenda:ion as part of the report pursuant to Section 4 (iii) of Article III of said Articles in respect of th( proposal that the Bank grant to the Dominican Republic (the Borrower) a loan in an amount f seventy five million Dollars ($75,000,000). The purpose of said loan is to improve access of the Borrower's poor citizens to an integrated package of social protection and promotion opp rtunities, including, in particular, human capital, enhanced employability and housing imprc vements in Selected Provinces. 1. The member of the Con mittee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a loan, and of the purpose t which the proceeds of the loan are to be applied. 2. The member of the Cort mittee is of the opinion that the project toward the financing of which the proceeds of such loan are to be applied comes within the purposes of the Bank as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said project is designed to promote the development of the productive f icilities and resources of the Dominican Republic and is in the interest of the Dominican Repub ic and of the members of the Bank as a whole. 3. Accordingly, the membe of the Committee finds that said project merits financial assistance from the Bank, and hc reby recommends said project for such assistance. Expe Selected by Governor for the Dominican Republic Dated at Washington, D.C.
